testcase.failure:
Given User has to launch the browser and flipkart application...............passed When User has to search the product through search box......................passed And User has to select and adding product into cart.........................passed And User has to place order and login to the application....................failed And User has to selecting address and payment option........................skipped And User has to remove the product from the cart............................skipped Then User has to close the browser..........................................skipped
